name: ra4
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1)))

stmt.origin: biimpi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1)))
-| wb(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1)))
-| wb(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)

comment: Restricted quantifier version of Axiom 5 of [Mendelson] p. 69. This is the axiom ~ stdpc5 of standard predicate calculus for a restricted domain. See ~ ra4v for a version requiring fewer axioms. (Contributed by NM, 16-Jan-2004.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 27-Mar-2020.)
